text_block_list.text: Then came the day of the Selection Race.

Eishin Flash was preparing to run in the next 1600 m race. 
She seemed to be feeling fine, but I noticed her eyes were 
frantically searching around…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah…

Her gaze finally came to rest on what looked like 
a foreign couple. Their somewhat stern aura was 
not dissimilar to hers. They must be her parents.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Phew. Toi, toi, toi…

text_block_list.name: Academy Staff A
text_block_list.text: It's time! Will all entrants for the 1600 m race line up, please!

Under the watchful eye of her parents, Eishin Flash began 
her Selection Race. A race which ended in ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —— Ah… Trainer. I thought you might show up.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Thank you.

Her disheartened expression was entirely understandable. 
In the end, she had finished in 6th place. However ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, if I had to give myself a grade, it would be a failing one. 
The reality is that I finished sixth.
choice_data_list: I still think you showed a lot of promise.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……We see things from a very different perspective indeed. 
But that's all the more reason why I……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Can I ask you a favor? I'd like you to 
come with me… to meet my parents.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes. I am… not really sure how to explain this result to them.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But you said before that my "feelings will show through". That's why… umm…
choice_data_list: All right, I'll come with you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …! Thank you very much.

Eishin Flash's parents were stood waiting together. 
She froze the moment she saw them ahead.

She looked at me with uncertainty, so I gave her 
an encouraging nod. With that, she seemed to make 
up her mind and took a step forward ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Mother, father, I haven't seen you in a long time. 
Thank you for keeping your promise and coming 
to watch my race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Despite that, I couldn't keep my promise. I intended to show 
you both that your daughter had developed respectably.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Mother
text_block_list.text: You worked hard, didn't you, Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh……

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. The result might not have been perfect, but I could 
clearly see the effort you've put in. You've learned to refrain 
from pushing yourself too hard, I see.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
And you did it all for us, didn't you? You remembered 
everything we taught you well. As parents, we couldn't 
be prouder.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Thank you for bringing us such joy, schatzi.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: (I remembered something. On a Christmas, my father once…)

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Flash, schatzi. Don't you forget this. The reason we can't allow any deviations is, of course, for the quality of a product.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: But above all, it's to carry out our duty with care and integrity — for the sake of somebody's happiness.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: Somebody's happiness…?

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Without that, anyone could simply follow the recipe. The prayers and heart we put into it is what gives what we do meaning.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: But prayers don't taste of anything! These aren't in your recipe either…

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Hahah… That's right. You don't have to understand the difference yet. One day, when you have something of your own that you'll be proud of, you'll get it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
(—— It was never about winning in some 
established fashion. What made them happy 
was that they inspired my desire to improve.)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
(I was exceedingly afraid of everything going wrong. 
But I didn't have to be. The really important thing was ——)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Mother, father. Thank you. 
I… tried my best.

Their conversation came to an end, and Eishin Flash looked a lot 
livelier as she followed her parents coming over to greet me.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
We can speak in Japanese. I've learned with my daughter, 
so I understand a little bit. Flash, could you introduce us?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: This is my trainer ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……candidate. I would like that, but we haven't discussed it yet.

The abruptness of that gave me a small shock, but some 
part of me thought it made perfect sense. I bet my heart 
was actually set on this from the first time I saw her.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
choice_data_list: I'll be her trainer, if that's what she wants.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
…Is that so. I trust you'll take good care of my daughter. 
Flash, you do your best with this trainer now, you hear?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —— Certainly!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The program I made was flawless. I believe I made no 
mistake at all in choosing to follow it. It's just that ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I lacked the ability to fully execute it, that's all. 
My naive assumptions left me pushing myself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……It would seem I am indeed a little offbeat. 
I don't know how to deal with deviating from 
a path once I've set myself one.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That's why I started thinking I need another point of view. 
Someone who will tell me when my path is flawed.
choice_data_list: <size=38>Is that why you want me to be your trainer?</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes. …Why was it that you accepted?
choice_data_list: Probably because I fell for you at first sight.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Huh!? F-Fell for me…?

Ever since seeing the way she ran, the sincerity in her eyes… 
I found myself thinking I wanted those things to continue 
for as long as possible.
choice_data_list: I think this was always meant to happen.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……No, no I'm certain it was not. 
It never was to me, at least.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As I was saying, I need some kind of guidance. 
From now on, I plan to keep running forwards, 
racing as horsegirls do.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
And you will have your place in those plans. 
Let's accomplish something we can be proud of together.

This was the start of Eishin Flash taking on 
the Twinkle Series with me.
